
#PROGRAM CONTAINED IN FILE RAM

00000 00000 00001 00010 000000000000 ADD R0, R1, R2                  R0 = 1 R1 = 2 R2 = 3
00001 00010 00000 00010 000000000000 SUB R2, R0, R2      3 - 1 =                   R2 = 2
00001 00001 00000 00001 000000000000 SUB R1, R0, R1      2 - 1 =     R0 = 1 R1 = 1 R2 = 2
00110 00010 00000 00011 000000000000 RS  R2, R3						  R3 = 1
00 02 20 00 
08 80 20 00
08 40 10 00
03 00 80 03
